name: Lemon Grass, Chili and Mint Steaming Liquid
recipeIngredient: 3 stalks fresh lemon grass, coarsely chopped
1 large jalapeno, cut across into thin slices

recipeInstructions.text: Combine lemon grass, jalapeno, mint and water in the bottom of the desired steaming equipment. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 1 minute. Begin steaming. Add boiling water if too much of the liquid evaporates before cooking is done.
